---
name: "Club Member Management"
about: "Feature request for managing club members, roles, and permissions."
title: "[Feature] Club Member Management"
labels: [enhancement]
assignees: []
---

## Feature Description

Implement a club member management system that allows:
- Adding, editing, and removing club members
- Assigning roles (e.g., president, secretary, member)
- Managing permissions for different roles
- Viewing member lists and profiles

## Rationale

Efficient club management requires clear roles and easy member administration. This feature will help clubs stay organized and empower student leaders.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Admins can add, edit, and remove members
- [ ] Roles can be assigned and changed
- [ ] Permissions are enforced based on roles
- [ ] Member list and profiles are viewable by club members

## Additional Context
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.
